author: alefisico
body:
Update needed for using grooming techniques at HLT (previously incompatible with confdb). A brief summary of this PR:
- Update FastjetJetProducer, and the classes affected by this change, with fillDescriptions method.
- It also removes PFJetParameters_cfi and AnomalousCellParameters_cfi dependencies in the python/*py config files not longer needed. (Default parameters in fillDescriptions part)

This is a first PR "updating and cleaning" this package as discussed with @rappoccio @ahinzmann @jdolen @nhanvtran @gkasieczka. I might submit another one just cleaning all the python files no longer needed.
title: Updating FastjetJetProducer with fillDescriptions
